title: Integration of Fractional Order Black-Scholes Merton with Neural Network. (arXiv:2310.04464v1 [q-fin.CP])
abstract: This study enhances option pricing by presenting unique pricing model fractional order Black-Scholes-Merton (FOBSM) which is based on the Black-Scholes-Merton (BSM) model. The main goal is to improve the precision and authenticity of option pricing, matching them more closely with the financial landscape. The approach integrates the strengths of both the BSM and neural network (NN) with complex diffusion dynamics. This study emphasizes the need to take fractional derivatives into account when analyzing financial market dynamics. Since FOBSM captures memory characteristics in sequential data, it is better at simulating real-world systems than integer-order models. translated_title: 将分数阶Black-Scholes Merton与神经网络相结合的集成
translated_abstract: 本研究通过提出基于Black-Scholes Merton（BSM）模型的独特定价模型——分数阶Black-Scholes-Merton（FOBSM），增强了期权定价。主要目标是提高期权定价的精确性和真实性，使其更加贴合金融景观。该方法将BSM和神经网络（NN）的优势与复杂的扩散动力学相结合。本研究强调在分析金融市场动态时需要考虑分数阶导数。由于FOBSM能够捕捉序列数据中的记忆特性，相比整数阶模型，它更适合模拟实际系统。研究结果表明，在复杂的扩散动力学中，这种将分数阶Black-Scholes-Merton与神经网络相结合的期权定价方法提高了价格预测的准确性。本研究的主要贡献在于发展了一种利用分数阶微积分和神经网络提高准确性的新型期权定价模型（FOBSM）。
tldr: 本研究提出了一种将分数阶Black-Scholes Merton与神经网络结合的新型期权定价模型（FOBSM），通过考虑分数阶导数和使用神经网络进行复杂扩散动力学建模，提高了期权定价的准确性和真实性。
en_tdlr: This study presents a novel option pricing model (FOBSM) that integrates fractional order Black-Scholes Merton with neural networks. By considering fractional derivatives and utilizing neural networks for complex diffusion dynamics modeling, it enhances the accuracy and authenticity of option pricing.
